Package org.hibernate.cache.jbc.util

Class Summary
CacheHelper Helper for dealing with JBossCache Configuration.CacheMode.
CircumventChecksDataVersion Used to signal to a DataVersionAdapter to simply not perform any checks.
DataVersionAdapter A DataVersionAdapter.
NonLockingDataVersion DataVersion used in regions where no locking should ever occur.
 

Enum Summary
CacheHelper.Internal
